TopicTitle: Ability to remove engine shrouds (in VAB)

Articles.Content:
Trying to do something like this causes the engine shrouds to smash into and break off all the engines when decoupling. So as of now, they're only be useful on the bottom stage of the rocket.

This could probably be avoided if there was a way to remove the shrouds in the VAB.

I've run into several problems with engine shrouds where I don't want them. They stick to decoupler and docking ports and the "jettison" feature never seems to work (why is jettison only available for action groups and not in flight?). With all the mods that handle fairings so well I curve the built-ins sometimes when they get in the way.
